actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations (without written report).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original joint resolution making continuing appropriations for the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year 1978.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Makes continuing appropriations for the Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies through fiscal year 1978 at a rate for operations not in excess of the rate in effect on September 30, 1977.

titles.title: An original joint resolution making continuing appropriations for the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year 1978.
